system.requirements:
Tier 3: Ambidextrous, Weapon Skill 40 
Aptitudes: Defence, Weapon Skill
system.effect: When character is armed with a shield, they can re-roll one failed Evasion test to Parry per round.

description.value: When character is armed with a shield, they can re-roll one failed Evasion test to Parry per round.
